EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is a test email.
Hi, I wanted to provide some background on what Grand & Toy can offer your organization. As Canada’s longest provider of business services, we understand that each organization is unique and needs proper support, products and confidence that they are getting the best value. We also bring over 135 years of experience in working as a supply partner to some of the largest organizations in Canada all the way to the single business operating form home. If you are wondering what Grand & Toy can do for you, please feel free to reach out. To give you an idea of what we provide, please check out these links: - TECHNOLOGY AND NETWORKING SOLUTIONS <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Technology/_/N-86f]]> - COFFEE AND BREAKROOM SUPPLIES <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Breakroom/_/N-dv9]]> - OFFICE SUPPLIES <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Office-Supplies/_/N-af2]]> - INTERIORS AND FURNITURE <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/interiors/default.aspx]]> - FACILITY CLEANING SUPPLIES <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Cleaning-Maintenance/_/N-dxp]]> - PROCUREMENT STREAMLINING SOLUTIONS <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/service-solutions.aspx]]> Best Regards, Todd Benner Northern Alberta Market 11522 168 St NW, Edmonton, AB T5M 3T9 E-mail: toddbenner@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:toddbenner@grandandtoy.com]]> | Mobile: 587 921 9433 | Web: grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]>
